ygData.subject: RE: world Server question
ygData.msgSnippet: Nope, no way. I think they thought about it for awhile, and turned down the idea. And, people are HUNGRY to get on a server that isn t so damned crowded. Same
ygData.messageBody:
Nope, no way. I think they thought about it for awhile, and turned down the
idea.

And, people are HUNGRY to get on a server that isn't so damned crowded. Same
thing happened with UO. New server goes up, instantly hundred of people on
it.

-----Original Message-----
From: LordRhaa@... [mailto:LordRhaa@...]
Sent: Tuesday, September 28, 1999 11:14 AM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] world Server question


From: LordRhaa@...

Does anyone know if there's a way to move one or all of your chars to a
different world server? I've noticed that when a new world server goes up
all the sudden there's 500+ people playing on it. I wouldn't have thought
that within the space of an hour or two of the new world server going online

that that many new players would start there or old players would start a
new
char on it.
THANKS
